short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to make live easier when using EasyVista monitoring tool

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to make live easier when using EasyVista monitoring tool. EasyVista monitoring is a tool to execute SQL queries but it has a poor functionallity. The idea of this Extension is to provide the user all the needed tools to make faster the work when building/executing SQL queries.
Some of the added functions are colorize text, predictive tables and fields, quick shorcut queries, queries history, quick comment query functionallity, etc.
This extension does not store any information of the user, it does not require login or password and itÂ´s free and has no ads. 

The main language still english but maybe in the future will have multi language.

Users should install this if they want a faster way to work regarding this tool.
